Constructs a {{tt|std::future}} object.

@1@ Default constructor. Constructs a {{tt|std::future}} with no shared state. After construction, [[cpp/thread/future/valid|{{c|valid()}}]] {{c|{{==}} false}}.

@2@ Move constructor. Constructs a {{tt|std::future}} with the shared state of {{c|other}} using move semantics. After construction, {{c|other.valid() {{==}} false}}.

@3@ {{tt|std::future}} is not {{named req|CopyConstructible}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|std::future}} to acquire shared state from}}
{{par end}}
